scripts.build: rm -rf www && mkdir -p www && cp offgrid.html www/index.html && cp -r css www/ && cp -r js www/ && cp -r i18n www/ && cp manifest.json www/ && cp sw.js www/
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:run:ios: npm run build && npx cap run ios
scripts.cap:run:android: npm run build && npx cap run android
